id.description: The unique identifier of this discount

applies_to.description: The specific entity this discount applies to (e.g., specific products, customers)

applies_to_id.description: The ID of the entity this discount applies to

applies_to_product_type.description: The type of product this discount applies to

applies_to_resource.description: The type of resource this discount applies to

channel_settings.description: Settings related to different channels for discounts

can_apply.description: Indicates if this discount can be applied via API

checkout_page.description: Discount settings for checkout page channel

can_apply.description: Indicates if this discount can be applied on the checkout page

customer_portal.description: Discount settings for customer portal channel

can_apply.description: Indicates if this discount can be applied on the customer portal

merchant_portal.description: Discount settings for merchant portal channel

can_apply.description: Indicates if this discount can be applied on the merchant portal

code.description: The code that customers can use to redeem this discount

created_at.description: The date and time when this discount was created

discount_type.description: The type of the discount (e.g., percentage, fixed amount)

duration.description: The duration of the discount (e.g., one-time, ongoing)

duration_usage_limit.description: The usage limit per duration for this discount

ends_at.description: The date and time when this discount ends

external_discount_id.description: The ID of the external source providing this discount

external_discount_source.description: The name of the external source providing this discount

first_time_customer_restriction.description: Indicates if this discount is restricted to first-time customers

once_per_customer.description: Indicates if this discount can only be used once per customer

prerequisite_subtotal_min.description: The minimum subtotal required before this discount can be applied

starts_at.description: The date and time when this discount starts

status.description: The status of this discount (e.g., active, inactive)

times_used.description: The number of times this discount has been used

updated_at.description: The date and time when this discount was last updated

usage_limit.description: The total number of times this discount can be used

value.description: The value or amount of the discount (e.g., 10 for 10% discount)
